√dviṣ 'hate'

present: [2.] dvéṣṭi  dviṣánti etc. V.+  dviṣṭe  dviṣáte etc. AV.+   -- [6.] dviṣati etc.  dviṣate etc.  

perfect: didveṣa  didviṣe  

aorist: [1.] adveṣi   -- [3.] adidviṣat   -- [7.] dvikṣat  dvikṣata (3s.)  

[future: dvekṣyati  dvekṣyate  dveṣṭā  ]

verbal: dviṣṭa V.+  dveṣṭum  dvéṣṭos  

secondary: intensive: deviṣ-   -- desiderative: didvikṣa-   -- causative: dveṣayati  

derivatives: dvíṣ V.+  dviṣa C.  -dviṣeṇya RV.  -dviṣṭi C.  dvéṣa V.+  -dveṣaka E.  dveṣin E.+  dvéṣya AV.+  dvéṣaṇa V.+  dveṣaṇīya C.  dvéṣas V.B.  dveṣṭṛ E.+
